# Build on the Interchain.

Reduce costs, scale effortlessly, and make your business come alive. Hundreds
of companies use Cosmos SDK to build fast, secure blockchain applications.

Start building↗ Talk to an expert→

Blockchains that scale

Near-zero fees

$0.01

Transaction rate as low as

500 ms

Build an appchain that scales at a fraction of the cost of platform chains,
while inheriting the built-in security of appchain architecture assured by the
Cosmos Hub.

Learn more about appchains→

###  Cosmos SDK ↗

Interchain standard for building appchains

###  IBC Protocol →

Connect ecosystems

###  CometBFT →

Best-in-class POS consensus

###  CosmJS ↗

Modern client-side solutions for Cosmos SDK appchains

###  CosmWasm →

Smart contracting for appchains

##  Design to spec, at internet scale

Customize your appchain from business logic to block production. Sovereignty
means you control every aspect of consensus, governance, permissions, and
smart contracts.

Get started with Cosmos SDK↗

**Build with full sovereignty** , from choice of validators to customizing
your runtime.

**Maximize flexibility** to define the state of your application. Customize
runtime, transaction types, and state transition functions.

**Build in your language of choice**. ABCI can be wrapped in any programming
language including Go and Rust.

**Scale without bottlenecks** and throughput limitations using CometBFT
consensus engine.

##  Smart contracts done smarter

The simplicity of smart contracts meets the power of the interchain stack.
Create powerful economic primitives that aggregate functionality across
multiple ecosystems. Neutron is the secure, simple, and cross-chain integrated
smart contract platform you need to bring your interchain application to
market.

Neutron→ CosmWasm →

**Build trustless automation** , verification, and more into your smart
contract runtime

**Speed up development** with trusted Rust libraries, compile to WASM and
deploy

**Aggregate liquidity** and onboard users from across different ecosystems

##  IBC: your protocol's connection to the global digital economy

Exchange data, value and tokens with the world's most secure and widely-
adopted cross-chain messaging protocol.

$64B+ USD

Total IBC-connected economy

Explore Tokens →

###  Interchain  
security

Leverage IBC connections for enterprise-grade security from Cosmos Hub's
hundreds of validators.

Learn more →

###  Interchain  
accounts

Interchain accounts open up new frontiers for cross-chain applications. Manage
cross-chain accounts and send messages to be executed on remote chains.

Learn more →

###  IBC  
Protocol

TCP/IP-inspired design makes for the most secure and proven cross-chain
mechanism, unlike multisig and validator-secured bridges.

Learn more →

##  The stack trusted by builders

Celestia

dYdX

Penumbra

"The interchain stack served us well in rapidly iterating on the Celestia
vision."

Ismail Khoffi, Celestia

##  A fast-growing, global community

Join a fast-growing community of developers and innovators connected all over
the world, building the new era of the internet.

  * ####  Community Chat ↗

Ask general questions and chat with the worldwide community on Telegram.

  * ####  Twitter ↗

Follow @cosmos to get the latest news and updates from across the ecosystem.

  * ####  Developer Chat ↗

Have technical questions about Cosmos tools? Ask a developer on the Community
Discord.

  * ####  Cosmos Forum ↗

Thinking about becoming a validator or interested in network matters? Join the
discussion.

###  News & Updates

Previous

###  Interoperable, customizable and scalable: Get To Know The Cosmos Network

The interchain is an ecosystem designed to address various challenges in the
context of blockchain and offer specific benefits that make it an attractive
choice for developers and blockchain-based projects.

Read ↗

###  What have we learned at the Interchain Academy?

First of all, let’s start by explaining what the Interchain Academy is. The
name might give you a hint as it is a hands-on, instructor-led program in
which every developer can learn about the Interchain Stack at their own rhythm
with the objective of preparing the developer to build application-specifi...

Read ↗

###  Why EVM Chains Pay Attention to IBC

Inter-Blockchain Communication (IBC) originated as a trustless method for
connecting Tendermint-based blockchains. Since its inception, the scope of IBC
has broadened to encompass a wider range of blockchains, notably EVM-
compatible ones such as Ethereum, BNB Smart Chain, Polkadot, and Avalanche.
This expansion includes networks both within and out...

Read ↗

###  TOKI and Oasys Unite to Bring IBC to the Leading Gaming Blockchain

Inter-Blockchain Communication (IBC) is expanding like never before. Today,
TOKI and Oasys are delighted to announce that we are teaming up to bring IBC
to Oasys, the leading gaming EVM blockchain: offering brand-new gaming
experiences and enhanced UX through cross-chain functionalities.

Read ↗

##  Start building on the interchain

Connect

Grow the economy and interoperability of your chain with the IBC protocol.

Validate

###  Become a validator →

Join a group of trusted decentralized validators to help secure the
interchain.

Appchains

###  Build an appchain →

Bring services to the interchain with out of the box appchain technology, and
best in class security.

#  Which Cosmos updates would you like to receive?

Ecosystem & Community

General news and updates from the Cosmos ecosystem and community.

Tools & Technology

Engineering and development updates on Cosmos SDK, Tendermint, IBC and more.

Sign up

#  Almost there!  
Confirm your email

You should get a confirmation email for each of your selected interests. Open
it up and click ‘Confirm your email’ so we can keep you updated.

Don’t see the confirmation email yet?

It might be in your spam folder.  
If so, make sure to mark it as "not spam".

Cosmos is a registered trademark of the Interchain Foundation.

This website is maintained by the Interchain Foundation (ICF) on behalf of the
decentralized community. The contents and opinions of this website do not
necessarily reflect those of the ICF. This website links to projects, dApps
and cryptocurrency exchanges as a service to the public. The ICF does not
warrant that the information provided by these websites is correct, complete,
and up-to-date. The ICF is not responsible for the content of those websites
and expressly rejects any liability for damages of any kind resulting from the
use, reference to, or reliance on any information contained within these
websites. If you spot an error or issue on this website, please email
marketing-[at]-interchain.io
